column4: is there a decent IRC client for ubuntu? I tried xchat and using Konversation now, but I miss a client with a "perform" feature (as in mIRC)
Xchat has a "connect command" feature, you can even make it run a whole script file there
Konversation probably has a comparable feature, I don't use it though
xchat irc typically has more advanced features then  xchat-GNOME irc
